cfg.forceHex: Enable force HEX mode (parse all the numbers in HEX).
cfg.groupByBytes: [Bin] Group bits by bytes (otherwise by nibbles).
cfg.rawBits: [Bin] Display raw binary numbers (disable all the bit rendering features).
cfg.registerView: [Bin] Display bits in register friendly view.
cfg.singleRow: [Bin] Display bits in a single row.
cmd.forceHexToggle: Toggle force HEX mode (parse all the numbers in HEX)
description: Display the binary and other forms of numbers in a very easy to read format.
